name: Facesit (ass)
description: Make a chair out of someone else's face.
message: %USER% makes a throne out of %TARGET%'s face.
user_messages: You plop your ass onto %TARGET%'s face.
You make a throne out of %TARGET%'s face.
target_messages: %USER% sits down on your face!
%USER% plops %USER_PRONOUN_THEIR% ass on your face!
%USER% makes a throne of your face. Gory, what a helluva way to die!
